transcript: Scammer: Hello sir, this is Rajesh from ICICI Bank. Scammer: Sir, we detected suspicious activity on your account. Your account has been compromised. Scammer: Can you please verify your UPI ID? User: Which UPI ID? Scammer: Your registered UPI ID starting with r.kumar@icici. Scammer: We need to verify it for security. User: I will not share that. Scammer: Sir this is urgent, a transaction of 50,000 is pending. Scammer: If you don't verify now, your account will be blocked.

Scammer: Hello, your Amazon account is suspended. User: What? Scammer: Yes, there's been suspicious activity. Please click on this link immediately: http://amaz0n-verify.xyz to reactivate. Scammer: There is a pending order of Rs 25,000 that needs verification. User: This looks fake. Scammer: No sir, this is urgent. Your account will be closed in 1 hour.

Scammer: Hello, this is from Income Tax Department. Scammer: We found discrepancies in your tax returns. Scammer: You have pending tax dues of Rs 5,00,000. Scammer: If you don't pay immediately, we will file a case against you. User: This is a scam. Scammer: No sir, this is government notice. Pay through bank transfer now.

Scammer: Hello, this is Microsoft tech support. Your computer has a critical virus. Scammer: We detected malware in your Windows system. Scammer: Let me get remote access to fix this. User: How? Scammer: Go to Windows Run, type command, and I'll tell you what to type. Scammer: Once I have access, I can remove the virus.
